MAN.TITLE: rboot
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Simulate a bootstrap resample from a sample

DESCRIPTION.P: Simulate a bootstrap resample from a sample. Give a resample of the same size as X, which is assumed to have one independent realisation in every row.
rboot(X,B) gives B columns of resamples. This form works only for X one-dimensional, i.e X column vector.
